channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Travelpayouts: All Travel Brands in One Place
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Travelpayouts: All Travel Brands in One Place

item.title: CVE-2024-0337|2024-08-01T18:18:19.215Z -- unknown -- travelpayouts%3A%20all%20travel%20brands%20in%20one%20place
item.description: The Travelpayouts: All Travel Brands in One Place WordPress plugin through 1.1.15 is vulnerable to Open Redirect due to insufficient validation on the travelpayouts_redirect variable. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to redirect users to potentially malicious sites if they can successfully trick them into performing an action.

item.title: CVE-2024-0337|2024-03-20T05:00:02.494Z -- unknown -- travelpayouts%3A%20all%20travel%20brands%20in%20one%20place
item.description: The Travelpayouts: All Travel Brands in One Place WordPress plugin through 1.1.15 is vulnerable to Open Redirect due to insufficient validation on the travelpayouts_redirect variable. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to redirect users to potentially malicious sites if they can successfully trick them into performing an action.
